text: Bee Log is an unincorporated community in Yancey County, North Carolina. ==History== A post office called Bee Log was established in 1874, and remained in operation until 1962. The name sometimes was spelled "Beelog". The origin of the name "Bee Log" is obscure. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Yancey County, North Carolina Category:Unincorporated communities in North Carolina
title: Bee Log, North Carolina
